A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thanks for all the bad reviews! It lowered my expectations and I really enjoyed it. Funny how quickly people forget all of the weird things from previous movies. Remember how weird it was that Lea and Luke had a romantic thing? How about Jar Jar\, ewoks\, and other stupid cute things from past movies. Whiny Anakin as a kid and a teenager. Fans act like these things are new\, but these things have been there since the beginning. I had fun and there were some great scenes.
